{{cpp/numeric/valarray/title|min}}
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/navbar}}
{{ddcl | 
T min() const;
}}

Computes the minimum value of the elements. 

If there are no elements, the behavior is undefined. 

The function can be used only if {{c|operator&lt;}} is defined for type {{tt|T}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The minimum of the elements.

===Example===
{{example|
 | code=#include &lt;valarray&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{
    std::valarray&lt;double&gt; a{1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Minimum value : " &lt;&lt; a.min() &lt;&lt; "\n";
}
 | output=Minimum value : 1
}}
